overview:
Bringing 20 years of experience to his position, Andy Zaffron is responsible for all of Sony Online Entertainment LLC Legal & Business Affairs as Executive Vice President and General Counsel.

Zaffron is marking his 15th anniversary with Sony companies this year. Before joining SOE in 2000, he was Director of Legal & Business Affairs at Sony Computer Entertainment America, responsible for property licensing, litigation management, and providing legal and business affairs support to the PlayStationÂ® sales, finance, operations and customer service groups.

relationships.title: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
